title: BugSplat
body: Hey riot, I was in a ranked game with my friend but then i got bugsplatted i had to update league again. Normally when i do this i get excused of having leaverbuster so if this is a bug please take out the leaverbuster in my account thxs.

replies.body: Leaverbuster can't determine unintentional leaves because all leaves causes others negative experiences.  An account won't received a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty after one game, but multiple which may be the case for your specific issue.  It's important to get this bugsplat fixed up by using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot.  This should get you back in game without issue, but test it out in custom games to be sure.  Let me know if you have any questions!
LeaverBuster penalties cannot be removed. If you're still experiencing issues please let us know so we can assist your in solving them and preventing future penalties.
